sentence.Network_en: Many of the islands are mainly wild and underpopulated.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数岛屿基本上都是一片荒凉、渺无人烟。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... underplay 对…轻描淡写 underpopulated 人口稀少的 underdeveloped 不发达的.

list.abs: 考研作文经典词汇 - 英语考研论坛 ... 人口过剩 overpopulation 人口不足 underpopulation 人口增殖 population reproduction.

entry.tran: 人口稀少的；人口密度过低的
entry.def: You describe a country or region as underpopulated when it could support a much larger population than it has.

example.ex: Many of the islands are mainly wild and underpopulated.
example.tran: 大多数岛屿基本上都是一片荒凉、渺无人烟。

means.word_mean: 1. having a lower population density than normal or desirable;

sentences.sentence: "the richly endowed but underpopulated Ivory Coast"

auth_sentence.content: North Lawndale, by contrast, is a sprawling, underpopulated, drug-infested neighborhood.
auth_sentence.res_content: North Lawndale, by contrast, is a sprawling, underpopulated, drug-infested neighborhood.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: North Lawndale, by contrast, is a sprawling, underpopulated, drug-infested neighborhood.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"在……下"; 2. "副手"; 3. 表示"不足,不够"

stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+handed手的→在底下做手脚
under不足,不够+develop发展+ed……的→发展不够
under不足,不够+graduate大学毕业[生]→n.大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生;adj.大学生的
under不足,不够+populate移民于+ed表形容词→adj.人口稀少的
under不足,不够+sized大小的→不够大的
under在……下+neath下面→adv.在下面 prep.在……的下面

stems_affixes.value_cn: 大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生
stems_affixes.word_buile: under不足,不够+graduate大学毕业[生]→n.大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生;adj.大学生的
under在……下+neath下面→adv.在下面 prep.在……的下面
under在……下+line线→在字底下划线,引申为强调

stems_affixes.value_cn: 承担, 担任, 许诺, 保证
stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+take拿→在下面拿→承担, 担任

stems_affixes.value_cn: 签在……下, 给……保险, 签名, 承诺支付
stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+write写→v.签在……下, 给……保险, 签名, 承诺支付
under不足,不够+play玩→没玩够→说得不够的
